# File rubilicious.rb, line 797
  def posts(date = nil, tag = nil)
    args = [(date ? "dt=#{date}" : nil), (tag ? "tag=#{u(tag)}" : nil)]
    get('posts/get?' << args.compact.join('&amp;'), 'post').map do |e|
      e['tags'] = e['tag'].split(' ')
      e.delete 'tag'
      e['time'] = Time.iso8601(e['time'])
      e
    end
  end
